------------------------     Dilettantenaufdringlichkeiten.   Hopelessness and resolution were alike struck out of his face by the fury of benevolence with which the old man cut him short. Dont you dare to speak a word against it, boy! cried Jehiel in a labored anguish. Good Lord! Im only doin it for you because I have to! Ive been through what youre layin out for yourself an stood it, somehow, an now Im most done with it all. But twould be like beginnin it all again to see you startin in.
